original_title: Matt Dillon: The California Milk Advisory Board
overview: You know some guys age, man... They forget about drinking milk. I don't know why. Maybe they forgot how good milk is. Milk's great! It's natural... It's, uh... It's satisfying. I like it when it's ice cold. You just can't beat it. So don't you forget it. I'm drinking milk for good.
title: Matt Dillon: The California Milk Advisory Board
